# In App Purchase 2

```
$ ionic cordova plugin add cc.fovea.cordova.purchase --variable BILLING_KEY="<ANDROID_BILLING_KEY>"
$ npm install --save @ionic-native/in-app-purchase-2
```

## [Usage Documentation](https://ionicframework.com/docs/native/in-app-purchase-2/)

Plugin Repo: [https://github.com/j3k0/cordova-plugin-purchase](https://github.com/j3k0/cordova-plugin-purchase)



## Supported platforms
- iOS
- Android
- Windows
